education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Information Technology
education.description: Studying computer science with a focus on artificial intelligence and machine learning. Currently maintaining a 3.8 GPA and participating in the university's AI research group.
Graduated with distinction in Science stream with Computer Science as an elective. Ranked in the top 5% of students nationally in the board exams.
Completed secondary education with honors in Mathematics and Science. Participated in national level mathematics and science olympiads.
